upper.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: in a higher position than something else
upper.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: near or at the top of something
upper.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: the upper floors of a building
There is an upper age limit for becoming a pilot.
upper.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: more important than other parts or ranks in an organization, system etc
upper.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: the upper echelons  (=the most important members) of corporate management
upper.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: further from the sea or further north than other parts of an area
upper.translation[0].definitions[3].exam: the upper reaches of the Nile
upper.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: the top part of a shoe that covers your foot
